testcase.classname: [Register] user could register with valid data
testcase.name: user can register using valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to registration page........................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth day "23" month "March" year "1997".............passed And user enters email.......................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: [Login] user could log into their account
testcase.name: user can login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user logs in with the data "lassunslaila@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: [Login] user could log into their account
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user logs in with the data "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user can change the currency
testcase.system-out: Given user selects Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then the currency of products is changed....................................passed

testcase.classname: [Search] user could search for products using name and sku
testcase.name: user could search using product name

failure.message: The following asserts failed: The resulted product no. 1 does not contain the searched keyword: book expected [true] but found [false], The resulted product no. 5 does not contain the searched keyword: book expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
Given user types the product "book" in the search bar.......................passed When user press on search button............................................passed Then the relevant results of "book" are displayed...........................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: The resulted product no. 1 does not contain the searched keyword: book expected [true] but found [false], The resulted product no. 5 does not contain the searched keyword: book expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefinitions.D04_searchSteps.searchSuccessful(D04_searchSteps.java:38) at ✽.the relevant results of "book" are displayed(file:///D:/FET/EcommerceAutomation/src/main/resources/Features/F04_search.feature:8)

testcase.classname: [Home sliders] user would be redirected to the corresponding product upon clicking on the slider

failure.message: The following asserts failed: The redirection URL is incorrect expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
Given user clicks on slider no. "1" button..................................passed When user clicks on the product shown in the slider.........................passed Then user is redirected to the page of the first product....................failed

testcase.classname: [Wishlist] user could add product to their wishlist
testcase.name: a product is added to wishlist upon clicking on the heart icon
testcase.system-out: Given user click on heart icon below the product image......................passed And user clicks on wishlist button after the success message disappears.....passed Then user could see item added successfully in wishlist.....................passed
